LW007-PIR
Are you sure you want to quit?
MOKO TECHNOLOGY LTD. ABOUT www.mokosmart.com
Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow LW007 use the Storage and location permission Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow LW007 use the bluetooth and location permission OK LW007 requires access to Storage and location permission. If the permissions are not on, LW007 cannot be used normally. Turn on Location permission After that, LW007 could search and connect with the device Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow LW007 use the Location permission LW007 requires access to Location permission. If the permissions are not on, LW007 cannot be used normally. LW007 requires access to bluetooth scan contract and location permission. If the permissions are not on, LW007 cannot be used normally.
LoRa GENERAL BLUETOOTH DEVICE Connection Settings Application Settings PIR Settings Hall Settings T&H Settings Device Information *When the battery is less than or equal to %s, the red LED will flash once every 10 seconds. *After replace with the new battery, need to click \"Reset\", otherwise the low power prompt will be unnormal.

// net Sync to cloud Request Error! Exit * If you have a LoRa gateway, please config the gateway connect to MOKO LoRa server, the server address is 101.37.81.143, the port is 1700, the current supported channel are AS923, AU915_CH00-07, AU915_CH08-15, EU868, US915_CH00-07, US915_CH08-15,select the correct channel please.
